contentrichtext.text: A '''conservation area''' is a tract of land that has been awarded protected status in order to ensure that natural features, cultural heritage or biota are safeguarded. A conservation area may be a [[nature reserve]], a [[park]], a [[land reclamation]] project, or other area. ==See also== {{portal|Sustainable development|Ecology|Environment}} *[[Conservation Area (United Kingdom)]] (urban heritage area in the UK) *[[Conservation designation]] *[[Fossil park]] *[[Historic District]] (United States) *[[Listed building]] *[[National park]] *[[Nature reserve]] *[[Special Area of Conservation]] (European Union) *[[Urban Heritage Park]] ==References== {{refs}} {{Environment-stub}} {{Protected-area-stub}} [[Category:Conservation areas| ]]
